FuncDef: This command converts an input file (key/certificate/CRL) to a system format file. The following list summarizes the formats supported by this command:
CLIs: import type { cert | key | crl } input <url-string> output <filename> format <input-format> [ password [ <32> <chars> <max> ] ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the URL for the input file. This URL could be either a local CF card URL file or a FP URL to download the input file.
Specifies the name of output file up to 95 characters in length. The output directory depends on the file type like following:.
The type of input file. Values-cert, key, crl.
Specifies the format of input file. Values-pkcs12, pkcs7-der, pkcs7-pem, pem, der.
Specifies the password to decrypt the input file in case that it is an encrypted PKCS#12 file.
